Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the incident by stating that the sub-inspector was "mercilessly beaten to death" when there is no evidence to support this extreme claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or proof to support the assertion that a Dalit protester was responsible for the assault on the sub-inspector.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photos being shared are not related to the Bharat bandh protest but are from a separate incident in Uttar Pradesh.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photos are evidence of the incident mentioned, without providing any additional context or verification.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by News18 and Navbharat Times, which suggest that the sub-inspector either had a heart attack or was injured during the Bharat bandh protests, but not assaulted by a Dalit protester.
